item.title: CSS Only Alternating Letter Colors
item.description: This morning, my manager presented me with a challenge: write some code to alternate letter colors. I offered to implement it using only CSS. We agreed on the terms: No JavaScript The text could be wrapped in a div or span, but no other markup could be used I started by finding out if there is an nth-letter() selector yet. Nope. That’s okay, my backup plan was to use mix-blend-mode to apply an image’s colors to the text below.
